name: Claire Lost in Nightmare
description:
Game Description
  • Guide Claire through her nightmare! Cakes, mines and explosions
  • Cakes - Lures zombies. when consumed, speeds up zombies.
  • Mines - Blows up zombies in radius
  • Goal : Reach goal portal for each stages.  Total 3 stages.
Controls
  • Mouse left click - Move Claire to clicked position
  • Mouse right click - Place Cake
  • Mouse right double click - Place Mine
Assets Used
  • Models & Animation : Claire, Zombie from Mixamo
  •  Dungeon generation : Dungeon Architect
  •  Dungeon assets : Polygon Dungeon
